intro: Psychotria awa, commonly known as the Awa leaf or Awa plant, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly the Amazon Basin. The plant is characterized by its elliptical leaves and small, white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found growing in moist, shaded environments within the rainforest canopy. The plant has been traditionally used in various cultural and medicinal practices by indigenous communities.
